author: pipermerriam
content: <@!129305432891195393> My familiarity with libp2p constructs isn't really adequate to make a detailed comparison.  Based on what I do know they both serve the basic purpose just fine, but libp2p is more broadly used and supported and maybe has more "features" above and beyond multiplexing message streams between different protocols.
